thread.title: Passenger in car shot late Sunday on Martin Luther King Boulevard
thread.title_full: Passenger in car shot late Sunday on Martin Luther King Boulevard | OregonLive.com

author: Noelle Crombie | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Passenger in car shot late Sunday on Martin Luther King Boulevard
text:
A female believed to be in her late teens was shot late Sunday while riding in a car on Northeast Martin Luther King Jr. Boulevard near Holladay Street.
The victim suffered non-life-threatening injuries, Portland police said. She was taken to an area hospital for treatment. Police were called to the scene shortly before midnight.
Police found evidence of gunfire in the area but have no information about a potential suspect.
Police do not know if the teen was the intended target or if the shooting is connected to a homicide that took place downtown earlier Sunday night.
Anyone with information about this shooting is asked to call the police non-emergency line at 503-823-3333.
-- The Oregonian
